analysis.description:
CrystalReignShard.tileDrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- winners[winList].transfer(bonusETH.div(64)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol#209-210)

CrystalReignShard.compWallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol#143-145)
CrystalReignShard.dropWallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol#142-143)
CrystalReignShard.marketingWallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol#145-150)
CrystalReignShard.start should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol#151-152)
CrystalReignShard.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol#138-139)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol#194-197:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol#196:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0x65302d3a313cf7b0bc7badbf0b9b07a4f176ed10.sol:
